text: Men must be governed by God or they will be ruled by tyrants.
author: William Penn

text: You know that being an American is more than a matter of where your parents came from. It is a belief that all men are created free and equal and that everyone deserves an even break.
author: Harry S. Truman

text: The animals of the world exist for their own reasons. They were not made for humans any more than black people were made for white, or women created for men.
author: Alice Walker

text: Some men know that a light touch of the tongue, running from a woman's toes to her ears, lingering in the softest way possible in various places in between, given often enough and sincerely enough, would add immeasurably to world peace.
author: Marianne Williamson

text: Wealthy men can't live in an island that is encircled by poverty. We all breathe the same air. We must give a chance to everyone, at least a basic chance.
author: Ayrton Senna
